H0.text: Tessera are the individual pieces that go to make up what. Collage

H1.text: Tessera are the individual pieces that go to make up what. Puzzle

H2.text: Tessera are the individual pieces that go to make up what. Tapestry

H3.text: Tessera are the individual pieces that go to make up what. MOSAIC

A4.text: Each piece of material is a tessera (plural: tesserae).

A5.text: Mosaics are made by arranging small regular or irregular pieces of colored stone, glass or ceramic, held in place by plaster/mortar, and covering a surface.
